Detailed Description

Header file for the IPDR transport abstraction.

Copyright (2005) Â© Amdocs, All Rights Reserved

This software is distributed on an "AS IS" basis, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND either expresses or implied.

Id
Transport.h,v 1.14 2005/05/11 12:25:16 dmitryk Exp

The file contains data structures used by the transport layer as well as macros used to actually call the specific transport (currently the macros always call the TCP implementation).

See also:
Transport/TCP/TCPTransport.c
Note:
This code was originally designed to allow for generic connections and transport. For now, it is specific to TCP only; but the types Connection and Transport have been kept to allow for the more generic version ... in the meantime, the compiler can catch typing errors.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct IPDR_tag_ConnectionHandlers ConnectionHandlers
 

The connection handlers structure is used to receive notifications in cases of a connection, disconnection and arrival of data.
